root.name: Texas Hold 'em
root.description: The game was released for the Xbox Live Arcade for free on launch day. After the promotion, the price was set at 800 Microsoft Points. It was also included in an Xbox Live Arcade game compilation disc that was included with new Xbox 360s during 2007.

similar_games.game: High Stakes on the Vegas Strip: Poker Edition
World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets
